message.entry: Invalid data type. Input arrays must be numeric or logical.
First two arguments must be vectors.
Initial conditions must be a vector of length max(length(a),length(b))-1, or an array with the leading dimension of size max(length(a),length(b))-1 and with remaining dimensions matching those of x.
First denominator filter coefficient must be finite.
First denominator filter coefficient must be non-zero.
